verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6918><s%>, Ye shall be holy; for I Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> am holy <S%H6918><s%>.

Ye shall fear <S%H3372><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>, and his father <S%H1><s%>; and ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
Turn <S%H6437><s%> ye not unto idols <S%H457><s%>, nor make <S%H6213><s%> to yourselves molten <S%H4541><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And when ye offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye shall offer <S%H2076><s%> it that ye may be accepted <S%H7522><s%>.

It shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> ye offer <S%H2077><s%> it <S%H4283><s%>, and on the morrow: and if aught remain <S%H3498><s%> until the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.
And if it be eaten <S%H398><s%> at all <S%H398><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, it is an abomination <S%H6292><s%>; it shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%>:

but every one that eateth <S%H398><s%> it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, because he hath profaned <S%H2490><s%> the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And when ye reap <S%H7114><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%>, thou shalt not wholly reap <S%H3615><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of thy field <S%H7704><s%>, neither shalt thou gather <S%H3950><s%> the gleaning <S%H3951><s%> of thy harvest <S%H7105><s%>.

And thou shalt not glean <S%H5953><s%> thy vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, neither shalt thou gather <S%H3950><s%> the fallen fruit <S%H6528><s%> of thy vineyard <S%H3754><s%>; thou shalt leave <S%H5800><s%> them for the poor <S%H6041><s%> and for the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
Ye shall not steal <S%H1589><s%>; neither shall ye deal falsely <S%H3584><s%>, nor lie <S%H8266><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H5997><s%>.
And ye shall not swear <S%H7650><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>, and profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thou shalt not oppress <S%H6231><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, nor rob <S%H1497><s%> him <S%H6468><s%>: the wages of a hired <S%H7916><s%> servant shall not abide <S%H3885><s%> with thee all night until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Thou shalt not curse <S%H7043><s%> the deaf <S%H2795><s%>, nor put <S%H5414><s%> a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%>; but thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>: thou shalt not respect <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%>, nor honor <S%H1921><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the mighty <S%H1419><s%>; but in righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shalt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> thy neighbor <S%H5997><s%>.

Thou shalt not go <S%H3212><s%> up and down as a talebearer <S%H7400><s%> among thy people <S%H5971><s%>: neither shalt thou stand <S%H5975><s%> against the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thou shalt not hate <S%H8130><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>: thou shalt surely <S%H3198><s%> rebuke <S%H3198><s%> thy neighbor <S%H5997><s%>, and not bear <S%H5375><s%> sin because of him <S%H2399><s%>.

Thou shalt not take vengeance <S%H5358><s%>, nor bear any grudge <S%H5201><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>; but thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%> as thyself <S%H3644><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>. Thou shalt not let thy cattle <S%H929><s%> gender <S%H7250><s%> with a diverse kind <S%H3610><s%>: thou shalt not sow <S%H2232><s%> thy field <S%H7704><s%> with two kinds of seed <S%H3610><s%>: neither shall there come <S%H5927><s%> upon thee a garment <S%H899><s%> of two kinds <S%H3610><s%> of stuff mingled together <S%H8162><s%>.

And whosoever <S%H376><s%> lieth <S%H7901><s%> carnally <S%H2233><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%>, that is a bondmaid <S%H8198><s%>, betrothed <S%H2778><s%> to a husband <S%H376><s%>, and not at all <S%H6299><s%> redeemed <S%H6299><s%>, nor freedom <S%H2668><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> her <S%H1244><s%>; they shall be punished; they shall not be put to death <S%H4191><s%>, because she was not free <S%H2666><s%>.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass-offering <S%H817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, even a ram <S%H352><s%> for a trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him with the ram <S%H352><s%> of the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>: and the sin <S%H2403><s%> which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> shall be forgiven him <S%H5545><s%>.

And when ye shall come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%>, and shall have planted <S%H5193><s%> all manner of trees <S%H6086><s%> for food <S%H3978><s%>, then ye shall count <S%H6188><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof as their uncircumcision <S%H6188><s%>: three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> shall they be as uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>; it shall not be eaten.
But in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall be holy <S%H6944><s%>, for giving praise <S%H1974><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof <S%H3254><s%>, that it may yield unto you the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.
Ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> anything with the blood <S%H1818><s%>: neither shall ye use enchantments <S%H5172><s%>, nor practise augury <S%H6049><s%>.
Ye shall not round <S%H5362><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your heads <S%H7218><s%>, neither shalt thou mar <S%H7843><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of thy beard <S%H2206><s%>.

Ye shall not make <S%H5414><s%> any <S%H3793><s%> cuttings <S%H8296><s%> in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for the dead <S%H5315><s%>, nor print <S%H5414><s%> any marks <S%H7085><s%> upon you <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.

Profane <S%H2490><s%> not thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, to make her a harlot <S%H2490><s%>; lest the land <S%H776><s%> fall to whoredom <S%H2181><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> become full <S%H4390><s%> of wickedness <S%H2154><s%>.
Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Turn <S%H6437><s%> ye not unto them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, nor unto the wizards <S%H3049><s%>; seek <S%H1245><s%> them not out <S%H2930><s%>, to be defiled by them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.

Thou shalt rise up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the hoary head <S%H7872><s%>, and honor <S%H1921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the old man <S%H2205><s%>, and thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And if a stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> with thee in your land <S%H776><s%>, ye shall not do him wrong <S%H3238><s%>.

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> with you shall be unto you as the home-born <S%H249><s%> among you <S%H157><s%>, and thou shalt love him as thyself <S%H1616><s%>; for ye were sojourners in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>, in measures <S%H4884><s%> of length <S%H4948><s%>, of weight, or of quantity <S%H4884><s%>.

Just <S%H6664><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%>, just <S%H6664><s%> weights <S%H68><s%>, a just <S%H6664><s%> ephah <S%H374><s%>, and a just <S%H6664><s%> hin <S%H1969><s%>, shall ye have <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>, who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> all my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and all mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.
